Room.Name: Main Courtyard - Center South
Room.ShortDescription: You are between the southern part of the courtyard and the center pool.
Room.LongDescription: The reflecting pool to the north is a quiet place where some of the older knights occasionally counsel the younger ones. The pool is known to have curative powers, and even the near-dead who have been brought to it have been restored to full health. On the south side you see a heavy equipment storage area.
